data.eml:eml: The most latent cladoceran in the Holarctic revealed-sinking Unapertura Sarmaja-Korjonen, Hakojärvi & Korhola, 2000 into the genus Rhynchotalona Norman, 1903 (Branchiopoda: Cladocera: Chydoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Damme, Kay Van, Nevalainen, Liisa (2019): The most latent cladoceran in the Holarctic revealed-sinking Unapertura Sarmaja-Korjonen, Hakojärvi & Korhola, 2000 into the genus Rhynchotalona Norman, 1903 (Branchiopoda: Cladocera: Chydoridae). Zootaxa 4613 (3): 463-476, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4613.3.3
